website_summaries.verdict: A good buy at an appealing price. Features include recently expanded SD card storage capability, front/rear cameras, night vision, and motion sensor.
pros: Accurate front/rear camera lenses and clear night vision
recent firmware update boosts SD card compatibility to 128GB
Suction cup mount is sturdy and stable
cons: Programming automatic features like shutoff timer can be problematic
Older version of the unit’s power cord may interfere with radio signals
Not everyone likes the double-sided tape mount

customer_reviews.title: Great while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Really liked it and used for about 18 months. It then stated turning off by itself. I would restart it and it kept shutting down and restarting. Reformatted SD card and even bought a new one-no change. I returned it. I had purchased a protection plan from Asurion and received a gift card reimbursement from them as soon as unit was dropped at UPS. I will try a different brand dash cam next time.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when it worked, died within 4 months and would no longer turn on :( I will be crossing “Rexing” brand off my list of replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Two time buyer and neither lasted very long
customer_reviews.text: I have owned two of these cameras and both died just after the 1 year mark. For the amount of money you spend on these, they 100% should last longer than a year. Very disappointed. I won't be buying Rexing again.
customer_reviews.author: bookbrook

customer_reviews.title: ZERO CUSTOMER SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! I have purchased two of these. Camera works ok but had problems with power cord. Contacted rexing who told me they don't carry this model anymore so they WONT HELP other than to offer me a discount on another new model they still feel like supporting. They told me to contact think island, who doesn't even respond to emails. Square trade was a waste also, they so far are useless claiming I still have a so called factory warantee. USELESS customer support!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Schell

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY! Manufacturing company must be a shell company
customer_reviews.text: Weak cheap plastic parts are used for this camera, the windshield mounted suction cups plastic completely snapped in half just sitting on my windshield. The company that makes these is even worse, good luck trying to get in contact with someone there about trying to get replacement parts, because apparently you can’t buy those online. Company will give you the run around and request you send them money via PayPal to ship you replacement parts and then go ghost. I can’t recommend you stay away from this company and it’s products highly enough. Cheap products and awful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind when you have this camera
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I’ve had this cam for a while now. A few summers and winters. I’ve had a lot of cameras before. And to this date this camera has not failed. It did freeze 2 times. But just a fast reset. This camera is great.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas ward

customer_reviews.title: Internal Battery die in 8 moth
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the camera, until internal battery die after 8 moth of use. Now camera cannot reliably save the last fragment, which might be critical. To add flavor to this story Rexing USA does not support this camera. They been nice to me to give me some gmail email for distributor. I will update my review based on response from this email. Here is my update: UNFORTUNATELY CANNOT 0 STARS - NOBODY RESPONDED TO MY EMAIL. WILL REPLACE BATTERY MYSELF.
customer_reviews.author: Serge Ostrovski

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and very good quality of recording video Perfect Front and rear dash cam...Must say was very easy to fit and set up. It took me about 15-20 min to set up the whole thing in my car.It looks like a proper compact digital camera for its size and quality of the video. The wide range front cam could monitor all the road condition, like people , pets or etc. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: my order was not complete
customer_reviews.text: it took 10 days to get my order then after the order came it was missing my OBD connector, now i have to wait again before i can do the install, not a happy customer at this point!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: Better than most. Battery in unit not holding charge therefore must turn unit on each time.
customer_reviews.author: jim bloodgood

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is a piece of junk. It worked fine for almost exactly a year and then wouldn’t do anything. I have no idea why or what happened. The screen just went to fuzziness and then wouldn’t come back on even after I tried plugging another cord into it. I’m truly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: amy carsello

customer_reviews.title: There are better dash cams on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for different vehicles. I was not satisfied with was the menu on the camera did not have all the options that the instructions listed. Setting options was difficult and I'm a veteran of electronic gizmo set ups. Camera worked fine for about 6 months but the time stamp changed itself for no apparent reason. The suction cup failed constantly. At one point both units I purchased started glitching, turning off and on and then stayed on without recording anything. Eventually I tossed both in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for some time now and I can't be happier. The picture quality is very good, and it's easy to just set it up and forget about it. I have it set to overwrite old recordings, but with a 32M card that takes awhile so I have a record that goes back quite a bit. Great buy. I replaced another camera that I don't have nice things to say about.
customer_reviews.author: Lostviking

customer_reviews.title: Internal battery does not last over the weekend.
customer_reviews.text: While the camera itself is great, the onboard clock and all other options will reset back to factory default over a standard 2 day weekend. Often, the onboard clock and other settings will even revert over-night.
customer_reviews.author: Robert-Alan

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera. Recommend !!!
customer_reviews.text: Was working 4 years with no any problem. WOW !!! Even didn't change battery. Just bought a new on Rexing V3 and really hope it will do the same. Thank you guys for you do for us
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy Davydov

customer_reviews.title: The camera interfears with the radio
customer_reviews.text: what I dislike about the camera is the interferenc it causes
customer_reviews.author: Thomas LeFlore Jr

customer_reviews.title: It's still working after two years...
customer_reviews.text: When we take care of things they seem to last longer. Fortunately we've not been in any accidents or had any other issues...
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Tom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent video quality...I purchased the newer Rexing and the video was so fuzzy it was returned. I ordered the S300 and very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: J. Groth

customer_reviews.title: Foreign junk at its best
customer_reviews.text: this product east up SD cards - hard to use - the power cord it comes with is to short - video is not the best
customer_reviews.author: chris latza

product_meta.title: REXING S300 Dash Cam Pro with 1080P 170 Degree Wide Angle
product_meta.description:
Introduction: 
The S300 Dash camera with SONY image sensor features a range of advanced functions, useful for all drivers. It starts recording immediately after the ignition is turned on. The night mode enables high quality recordings in poor lighting conditions. The WDR (wide dynamic range) system can record greater scene details, from shadows to highlights than normal. The 6 glass lenses plus 1 infrared filter lens are designed to prevent fogging from heat generated after long recording, providing sharp and vivid images in a wide range of weather conditions. Coupled with a highly sensitive image sensor, the Rexing S300 guarantees sharp and superior video quality. The S300 records Full HD videos (1920 * 1080p) at 30 fps with H.264! Please note: The package does not include microSD card. 

Why Choose S300? 

1. Emergency Lock Button & Accident Auto Detection Feature (G-Sensor) can lock current video file for you. 
2. Improved design and wedge shape make it easy to mount behind the mirror without blocking your view. 
3. An adhesive mounting pad is the preferred mounting mechanism. It provides a secure and permanent mounting without distraction, much safer than competitive products. A suction cup is included as an alternative. 
4. Multiple additional venting gills have been added to improve reliability in extreme weather and temperature conditions.
5. Ergonomic design of functional buttons improves user interface and makes it easy to operate with both hands. 
6. The super wide range lens covers a wide range of areas and collects more evidence details. 
7. The rotatable lens enhances flexibility of capturing either front-view or rear-view of activities. 
8. Premium real HD quality video(1920x1080) for both day-light and night condition. 
9. Top-notch customer care at thinkislandllc@gmail.com. 

Here is the BrandNew product: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07KLYBNH2
feature_bullets: Full-HD Video 1920*1080 at 30 fps. Super wide 170° angle camera can automatically record hands-free in a continuous loop. Large 2.7" screen, slim design.

Hardware Acceleration decoding by Novatek NT9665BG. Superior night-vision image sensor by world class f2.4 six-glass lens, and unique WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) video system (Similar to HDR imaging technology in cameras) records superior video with more detailed shadowing and highlights

An adhesive mounting pad is the preferred mounting mechanism. It provides a secure and permanent mounting without distraction, much safer than competitive products ! Emergency Lock Button & Accident Auto Detection Feature (G-Sensor) can lock current video file. Supports microSD cards (up to 128GB)

Safety First: High Quality Li-polymer 3.7v 110mah battery can bear high/low temperature, with official MSDS report and the most strict PONY Lab Certificate (Tested: 6+ hours in 170°F, 6+ hours in -40°F)
One Year Warranty To Cover Any Issues. First Class support for all customers. All inquires will be responded within 24 hours, and 100% satisfaction guaranteed.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars75 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
